Parameters: View: The child view that was moved
float: The new offset of this drawer within its range, from 0-1
onDrawerSlide(android.view.View, float).Description: Called when a drawer's position changes.

Parameters: int: The new drawer motion state
onDrawerStateChanged(int).Description: Called when the drawer motion state changes. The new state will be one of @B_android#support#v4#widget#DrawerLayout#STATE_IDLE_E@, @B_android#support#v4#widget#DrawerLayout#STATE_DRAGGING_E@ or @B_android#support#v4#widget#DrawerLayout#STATE_SETTLING_E@.

Parameters: View: Drawer view that is now open
onDrawerOpened(android.view.View).Description: Called when a drawer has settled in a completely open state. The drawer is interactive at this point.

Parameters: View: Drawer view that is now closed
onDrawerClosed(android.view.View).Description: Called when a drawer has settled in a completely closed state.

ClassDesc: Stub/no-op implementations of all methods of @B_android#support#v4#widget#DrawerLayout#DrawerListener_E@. Override this if you only care about a few of the available callback methods.
